properties.Name: Scope3Category2CapitalGoodsHybridMethodPurchasedGoods
properties.Description: The purchased goods associated with the scope 3 category 2 hybrid method for calculating capital goods emissions.

Columns.Name: ReportingLegalEntityId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Legal Entity.

Columns.Name: CapitalGoodsTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Capital Goods Type.

Columns.Name: GoodTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a good/service type.

Columns.Name: GoodsServicesPurchasedUnits
Columns.Description:
The quantity of goods/services purchased.

sum across purchased goods or services:
 (quantities of good purchased (e.g., kg) x supplier-specific product emission factor of purchased good or service (e.g., kg CO2 e/kg))

Columns.Name: GoodsServicesPurchasedMassUomId
Columns.Description: The mass of the goods/services purchased.

Columns.Name: GoodServicesPurchasedAmount
Columns.Description: The amount of the goods/services purchased.

Properties.Description: The purchased goods associated with the scope 3 category 2 hybrid method for calculating capital goods emissions.
